column6: A new bimonthly ongoing series debuts, showcasing Marvel's flagship hero in stories by our hottest new writing talent! In these two self-contained stories, Spider-Man faces off against an old villain, Slyde, who's gotten himself a ridiculous villain makeover; and then Spider-Man brings some joy into the life of a troubled child. 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Shinkiro | penciller:Sean Chen | penciller:Takeshi Miyazawa | writer:Joseph Goodrich | writer:Brian Lynch
